text:
- [Narrator] Welcome to
the Connected Community
from Amazon Web Services.

A free-to-join digital
platform where you'll

find practical information
on how your business
can make the most of cloud technology.

We've designed it to help
your organization grow

by bringing you knowledge
from experts and your peers.

There will be a range of
exclusive content and offers.

Plus, you'll be a part
of the conversations
between business leaders on themes
such as maximizing technology investments,

improving security and
resiliency via cloud,
increasing your productivity,

enhancing employee and
customer experiences.

You'll learn how cloud technology
can help deliver savings
and help you grow your revenue streams
by enabling you to innovate faster.
You'll hear from your peers

as they share advice based
on their own experiences.
You'll also get access to a range

of exclusive promotions on
key software and services

designed to help you
improve customer experience,

fast track your cloud journey,
and grow your business.

The Connected Community built
by AWS, but powered by you.
And we'd love you to be a part of it.
Join the Connected Community today
and get access to the information
and resources your business needs to grow.
